A '''sculk vein''' is a [[feature]] that consist of several [[sculk vein]] blocks. It generates exclusively in the [[deep dark]] biome.

== Generation ==
The sculk vein feature generates on the four sides and lower surface of stone-like blocks including [[stone]], [[andesite]], [[diorite]], [[granite]], [[dripstone block]]s, [[calcite]], [[tuff]], and [[deepslate]]. It generates only in [[air]] and [[water]].
